meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mark Day Bill Collins Elise Beraru Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #17.

td.p: Mark Day, a games and recreation manager from Long Beach, California
Bill Collins, a probation counselor originally from Brooklyn, New York
Elise Beraru, an insurance underwriter from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,750)

tr.td: BRIDGES
SINGERS & DANCERS
"FRIDAYS"
HOLIDAYS
CARTOONS
